UseTryWithResources.description:
Description

Minimum Language Version:Java 1.7

Java 7 introduced the try-with-resources statement. This statement ensures that each resource is closed at the end
of the statement. It avoids the need of explicitly closing the resources in a finally block. Additionally exceptions
are better handled: If an exception occurred both in thetryblock andfinallyblock, then the exception from
the try block was suppressed. With thetry-with-resources statement, the exception thrown from the try-block is
preserved.
